actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To extend the supplemental security income benefits program to Guam and the United States Virgin Islands.

summary.text: Amends part A (General Provisions) of title XI of the Social Security Act (SSA) to: (1) end the exemption of Guam and the Virgin Islands from repealed programs for the aged, blind and disabled; and (2) make them eligible for the Supplemental Security Income program for the Aged, Blind, and Disabled under SSA title XVI.

titles.title: To extend the supplemental security income benefits program to Guam and the United States Virgin Islands.
